title: Intensive Short-Term Technical Chinese e-Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese character knowledge and simple conversational expressions
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing workplace-specific technical terminology education for working professionals. Optimized content delivery is required, considering mobile device-centric learning environments.

learning_goals: Can accurately read and pronounce 50 basic Chinese characters and terms frequently appearing in technical documents (manuals/emails)
Can apply 30 essential expressions in technical video conferences (online meetings) contextually by situation
Understand the context and usage of technical terms with over 80% accuracy using multimedia content (videos/animations) accessible via mobile devices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
